title: I Picked Up a Merman - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Bisexual Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Models   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Seme Protagonist   Short Story   Showbiz
author: 汪毛球
description:
“You are the one who pulled me up, so I am now your fish.”

For love, the merman prince sought his significant other across a thousand miles. Due to an unexpected turn of events, he became his crush’s contract model. Moreover, he successfully moved into his crush’s house.

Nolan: To find my significant other, what does it matter if I don’t have a tail?

Chu Muyu: …Can someone tell me why it was actually a merman who moved into my house?>
